entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023
